PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... saucily 傲慢地 sauciness 傲慢 saucy 漂亮的.

list.abs: The saucy child protruded her tongue ., 这无礼的孩子伸出了她的舌头.
she wore a saucy new hat ., 她戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子.
隔天，中央新闻社又收到一封明信片，内文同样以红墨水写成。信里，写信者自称是“调皮的杰克”（saucy Jacky），并提到他打算“隔天再干两件事”——一般认为是凌晨伊丽莎白·史泰德和凯萨琳·艾道斯这两起命案。另外，.
She is a saucy miss ., 她是个莽撞的女孩.

auth_sentence.content: Life knocks the sauciness out of us soon enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: Life knocks the sauciness out of us soon enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Life knocks the sauciness out of us soon enough.

auth_sentence.content: Whilst "Ooh La La" confidently struts its electro-glam stuff it still smacks of coy sauciness where once there was wantonness.
